quiztime

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • quiztime.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    This class create a question with its question, answer, complexityLevel, and include methods for getting question, getting answer, getting complexityLevel, setting complexityLevel, checking whether the candidate answer matches the answer.
    Since:
    17/09/2013
